description:
Instagram에서 이 게시물 보기            STYLEKOREAN(@stylekorean_global)님의 공유 게시물

Description


This is organic jojoba oil that creates a moisturizing barrier on the skin.
Jojoba oil produced in the Jujube Valley of Israel boasts the highest quality.
It is raw, organic, and extracted in its pure form without any chemicals or artificial processes, making it safe and environmentally friendly.
 
How To Use

1. Spread on your palm, rub your hands together and generate heat, gently press and apply to your entire face, letting it absorb.
2. Mixing oil and skincare products together in one pump will restore healthy, nourished skin.
3. Using it on areas of your body such as your skin, scalp, and hair will provide optimal moisturization.
 
Key Ingredients

Cares for the skin, forming an excellent moisturizing barrier, and keeping the skin moist and healthy, containing oil extracted from the jojoba tree seeds that have survived in the harsh land of Israel.
Packed with freshly harvested and healthy raw jojoba oil sourced directly from Israel, this skincare product absorbs smoothly with a high skin compatibility and leaves minimal residue, promoting a healthy complexion.
We only use healthy jojoba fruits that are grown using mineral-rich recycled water cultivated through organic methods and natural fertilizers to minimize environmental pollution.

product_name: Roll With Tea Tree Roll-On Face Oil 11ml
description:
Description

A perfect blend of tea tree leaf oil that absorbs quickly, leaving your skin refreshed, smooth, and radiant.d
- Soothes irritated skind
- Hydrates the skind
- Clears and controls breakouts with salicylic acid

How To Use
Gently roll over your blemish concerns for targeted application. Apply 3-5 times throughout the day. *Please store upright with the cap tightly sealed.

Key Ingredients- Tea Tree Leaf Oil: Helps purifies and refreshes  skin- Salicylic Acid: Exfoliates the skin- Apple Seed Oil (Pyrus Malus (Apple) Seed Oil): Rich in antioxidants to help soothe  and restore skin radiance- Camellia Oil (Camellia Japonica Seed Oil): Hydrates and calms skin

original_name: [I DEW CARE] Roll With Tea Tree Roll-On Face Oil 11ml

description:
Description



An all season, lightweight oil for anti-oxidation and replenishing nourishment. 

Amazingly fast-absorbing watery oil gives a soft and fresh finishing without stickiness and is made from five natural plant-derived oils.

Formula contains 45% fermented black rice extract. Black rice is rich in anti-oxidants and is full of highly concentrated polyphenol and flavonoid pigments which protects skin against free radicals, including ultraviolet radiation and pollution, and encourage new cell growth. 

Jojoba, sweet almond, sunflower seed and lavender oil further protect skin, promote elasticity and soothe irritations.Distinctive technology delivers fermented black rice extract to skin deeply and effectively with sphere-shaped liposome infused in Panax Ginseng Root ingredient.
Panax Ginseng liposome contains Saponin substance infused with 6-year Ginseng concentrate to eliminate impurities and helps with anti-aging.

95% naturally-derived ingredients, vegan-friendly, cruelty-free and made with EWG safe ingredients.


Suggested Use


For the last step of morning and evening skin care routine, rub 2-3 drops of the oil on the palm of your hand and gently spread it out according to the skin texture, and then press gently to absorb it.  
Mixing nutritional cream and essence will provide excellent moisturizing and soothing effects.



Ingredients

Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Triolein, Jojoba Oil/Macadamia Seed Oil Esters, Heptyl Undecylenate, Camellia Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Tocopherol, Glyceryl Dioleate, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil

reviews.content: Very nice, I recommend it Very nice, I recommend it

reviews.title: Facial Oil
reviews.content: The Haruharu Wonder Black Rice Facial Oil is a lightweight yet nourishing facial oil that gives an instant glow. Despite being an oil, it absorbs quickly and doesn’t feel greasy at all. I use it as the last step in my nighttime routine or mix a drop with my moisturizer. It helps lock in moisture and makes my skin look more radiant and smooth. The black rice extract gives antioxidant benefits, which I love. It’s great for dry patches or dull skin, and it doesn’t clog pores. It has a light natural scent that fades quickly. A really elegant facial oil.

description:
Description

Organic Rosehip Oil is a premium moisturizing facial oil made from 100% ECOCERT certified organic rosehip oil. The concentrated 100% rosehip oil, cold-pressed from natural rosehip fruit grown on the Andes, moisturizes skin leaving it nourished and supple. 
The Cold press method extracts the active ingredients of natural raw materials using solely physical pressure with no high heat applied. AROMATICA Organic Rosehip Oil hasn’t undergone the processes of decolorization or deodorization which gives it a unique reddish color and minimizes the destruction of the nutrients such as Chlorophyll and Tocopherol. 
More than a superfood, Rosehip has 20 times more vitamin C, A, B, E, and P than lemon. A refreshing, moisturizing formula gives the feeling of the combination of serum and oil! Incredibly moisturizes skin inside out even with a small amount. It is suitable for all skin types including dry..
Suggested Use

Warm 1-2 drops of organic Rosehip oil in clean palms and gently press onto face, allowing it to fully absorb into the skin.
* For best results, mix a few drop of the oil with less oily lotion or cream to give your skin an extra boost of moisture.
Ingredients


Organic ingredients 100%
*Rosa canina fruit oil *Organic raw material(s)
